item.title: HTB - Shared
item.description: Enumeration Host Discovery ‚ùØ ping -c3 10.10.11.172 PING 10.10.11.172 (10.10.11.172) 56(84) bytes of data. 64 bytes from 10.10.11.172: icmp_seq=1 ttl=63 time=39.8 ms 64 bytes from 10.10.11.172: icmp_seq=2 ttl=63 time=48.3 ms 64 bytes from 10.10.11.172: icmp_seq=3 ttl=63 time=36.0 ms --- 10.10.11.172 ping statistics --- 3 packets transmitted, 3 received, 0% packet loss, time 2003ms rtt min/avg/max/mdev = 36.012/41.390/48.337/5.152 ms A TTL value of around 64 is a solid indicator that this is a Linux system.
